string.text: '100 Anecdotes from Sergei Catalina'
Anecdote number
Degtyaryova stopped inviting play near the 'Skadovska' in the 'heat lightning'. Degtyarev did not know how to shoot blanks.
Degtyaryova God was sorry mutilated flesh. Therefore, it is always saved them from the pursuing dogs before killing.
Stalkers was once cut boars eggs and bled, so they took only the hoof to jelly.
Seeing a career dredge, Degtyarev without hesitation repaired dredge and began to wash at night in his career zolotishko.

Early in the morning Degtyarev climbed onto the roof of logging 'Skadovska.' From there, he admired the dawn, watching the frolicking at the bottom of stalkers and from time to time were shot circling above him crow. Monsters him to be fed.
Pulling from a dead mercenary Armorer Degtyarev suddenly clearly understood why nobody uses upgrade. Under body armor was the second shot. Exactly the same.
Degtyarev did not know how to be rude. And in order to at least get re-owl, hung in front of him with a talking parrot cage.

Degtyaryova had long been interested in its main task. Day and night he was thinking of only one thing. How would doapgreydit AK-47 to the functions of the washing machine, which is requested from the Zone to bring birthday wife.
How pleaded Degtyarev Hawaiians, but he sold out of the box of cartridges with a mysterious inscription plan only members of the group 'Freedom'.
-Eh, A woman would Wait! - Heard Degtyaryova all sites bandits. Cannibals. He said in his PDA.
After talking with Degtyaryova Talking Controller addition of the phrase 'Man, get out of here ...' learned the phrase 'Man, come here ..'
To wean Cardano drink vodka Degtyarev caught Zombie outwardly looks like Cardan, took his gun, gave a bottle of vodka in hand 'Cossacks' and led to Cardan birthday.

If you hate guns to the gates on the left side - do not detract from the author's work on the mod requests to alter the gates to the other side. Just put in front of mirror monitor and enjoy the game as game developers.
Seeing on the upper deck of the Ark Noah two-handed saw Degtyarev concluded that dismembered corpses Noah was not alone.

If you turn off the auto-save in the options and the game became faster work, you joy came to Pripyat, and the light suddenly turned off - no need to swear electricians. Just start the game again, and often remembers the key 'F5'.
Listening to Colonel Kowalski Degtyaryova at times it seemed that 'cautery Brains' Shooter disabled not through.
Degtyarev kicked out of high school mercenaries, saying that the parents of the guys will no longer pay for the protection of the school.
Seeing the dog furiously biting November artifact 'Compass' Degtyarev realized that he still have to shove the Guide c bottle in Red Forest.
SnagIt did not know Degtyaryova therefore found in his box at the Midsummer torn condom and a note from Degtyaryova with painted there figs.
Stalkers do not come up with the best jokes on April Fool as swap personal box Degtyaryova with waste heat and remove the bulb above them.
Calming supervisor, Degtyarev found his old videotape sessions Kashpirovsky and unfinished bottle Stalker? 'Charged Chumak'.
The shooter did not like war, but the desire from childhood to fly a helicopter advantage and he went into the laundry room.
Lieutenant Sokolov was a very responsible person. He personally ran the entire area and locked all the warped fallen helicopters with a key.

Experienced Major Degtyarev, held special training and not a few 'hot spots' finally realized the wise words of Lenin, 'Study, study and study again!' Because after reading tactics in arms even better shot of the stick.
Chapa from Malyava knew Degtyarev - Major Security Service, but the desire to take the place of plow instead of the Sultan was stronger and he took Degtyaryova the grouping.

All around lay crumpled pack of cigarettes and cigarette butts, but none stalker did not smoke. To yourself not to give Degtyarev ran to school Pripyat and the toilet with pleasure took out secret pocket ekzy 'Marllboro.'
The bandits were afraid of stalkers, stalkers - mercenaries, Monolith - rassvetovtsev ... And only Degtyarev feared no one. He knew that with the help of cheat codes can beat anyone.

Long considered Degtyarev mysterious contraption - Army timer, trying to understand its purpose. Suddenly abdominal zaburchalo and he raced toward the toilet. Sometimes expired canned 'Breakfast tourist' to help realize a lot of things in the Zone.
Here save up money to buy myself Volynov specific ... - reasoned thug sitting by the fire ... It's unlikely ... - thought Degtyarev, earning another headshot.
Artifacts 'Compass' Noah was handing out right and left completely free in the hope that someone will forget and just run away from the door. He knew how to shoot.
Sold Degtyaryova premium PM Zhulyabsky always offered to buy. He hoped that the Major wake conscience.
Owl were absolutely on the drum case of mercenaries, but the laptop with porn and skandalnyim latest series 'House 2' attracted him like a magnet.

Nitrogen was an accomplished thief and did not do anything with their own hands. Only radio beacons from materials with a cement plant. According to possessions stalkers he sent fumble Senka. He did not touch only caches 'Svoboda' c hashish. -Ruki Of nitrogen where it is necessary to grow - laughing 'Svoboda'.

General Security Service did not like football. He went to see the fights without rules involving tagging bar 100 X-ray. With the disappearance of Strelok attendance in the arena fell and general sent Degtyaryova organize sports activities at Yanov.
At the sight of the bandits hand Degtyaryova she ran to the trunk. But Major was ambitious and did not touch them until he was given the achievement of 'Diplomat'.
Every day in the Zone is released once a week - eclipse. During emission stalkers frantically thrown out of rucksacks do not need stuff, and during eclipses hopelessly looking for a woman.
Degtyaryova Zone knew each Pseudodogs and only Zulu was very surprised to learn that Degtyarev - Major SBU.

By aPellicle. the pilot, 'Where can you spend?' Degtyarev counted if not impassable jungle of the Amazon, at least on an underground brothel. After all, having a detector and a simple map to Yanov could pass even a child.
When Degtyaryova offered 'tryahanut' stalkers on 'Shevchenko', he advised not to waste your time on trifles, and 'shake' the local savers.

Vano bought from vendors personalized rucksacks and threw them on the site. He was hiding in the reeds. But even after he became to put in rucksacks for 500 rubles, bitter experience stalkers longer stoop over them.
On the road, waiting impatiently Degtyaryova Mina. Wish Mines Degtyarev did not share.
Herman really like the toilet and rushed to the bunker from corner to corner, as the entrance to the toilet blocked the trader, and get out of the bunker Herman was scared to death.

Stalkers addition to conventional products fed pigs hooves, eyes, flesh, blood-suckers tentacles and even the dog's tail. Tails of dogs do not particularly like Degtyarev. Hair is constantly stuck between teeth and toothpicks in his beard was not on sale.
From planting hemp Zone 'Svoboda' is clearly not lucky. First, the entire field burrows have rooted up the jerboa and the first few shoots instantly devoured the flesh.

Pushing open the door in the evening on 'Skadovsk' Degtyarev stunned. Mentally sound 'Girl, you'll be a woman soon ...', and in the center of the bar whirling dance Beard Sychom. Beard now and then gently stroked owl on the rump. Birthday Cardan was in full swing ...

When asked Degtyarev stalkers questions about the helicopters, they looked at it as a full debilla. Because every stalker was known - from satellites visible from space even stars on the shoulder straps, not to mention the helicopters.
Met Degtyarev female psevdogiganta. Appeared after a while the offspring did not like psevdogigantu.
Zombies always aroused in the soul Degtyaryova pity. Therefore, before you shoot, he approached each and gently stroked the head.
Connected to appear in the most unlikely places, like mushrooms. Degtyarev then decided to find a working underground in that no matter what, and to go on holiday with his wife.

-Polkovnik Kowalski with the assistance of 'The Godfather' in the laundry room on the Pripyat 'launder' money. - Degtyarev reported to headquarters by radio SBU found for 'Monolith' after they refused to share.
Stalkers have long roamed the Zone, as the park. Only Degtyarev had to pay the Guide.
Once in the next teleport Degtyarev first thing checked on the spot whether the pants, keeping in mind about the lost for the first time meet apgreydenny trunk.
Seeing near his carefully hidden personal rucksack 'pile' and smeared crumpled piece of paper, Degtyarev realized that in a rucksack can not climb.
-What Are you pouting lips. - Smiled Degtyarev stalker. Stalker blushed and pulled out a harmonica.
Mercenaries met all 'on clothes.' Even bloodsucker, dressed in kombez and hiring a mercenary points from Degtyaryova met on the basis of mercenaries with bread and salt.
Entered Degtyarev all categories. Sits and misses. Went and joined the Society for the Protection bloodsuckers.

Degtyarev not scared hunting him 'alfovtsev.' He was glad. The money raised from the sale of the PDA detachment commander could always buy a bunch of ammo. Stalkers even began to shy away to the side, because he constantly pestered everyone you meet: You 'alpha' hour is not met?
Business for Jani medic clearly flagged. He offered to make everyone 'ukolchik.' But 'Svoboda' not amused 'smack' and 'dolgovtsev' drank only yogurt.

Tired Degtyaryova unfasten Guides money and repaired helicopter. To celebrate, got drunk and went straight to Pripyat. With pyanu vporolsya an anomaly, and it immediately became clear why the 'pinwheel' got everything.
After retiring from the Zone, Degtyarev resigned and bought an apartment in St. Petersburg. Closer to the Kunstkammer. He was tormented by nostalgia.
And Dolly the sheep they still turned out. - Degtyarev thought, looking at the run on the field herd of flesh.

Bloodsucker would not want to part with the dirt on Uncle Yar and ran for Degtyaryova up to the checkpoint. After all, the camera found Degtyarev, was filmed Uncle Yar in the sauna with naked girls of easy virtue in indecent poses.
Cardan nitrogen tired of poking around with pieces of iron, and they asked them Degtyaryova search tools. They both were dentists.
On the birthday of Cardan vomit more than seen. His body is used to vodka and joker Beard slipped him a sticky, stringy liqueur.
Zulu was not a sickly kid, but carry gun him terribly tired and he gladly gave it Degtyarev.
Bodyguards Degtyaryova offered their services, but his body Degtyarev not trust anyone.
Degtyarev was absolutely on the drum that lay in the premise - dynamite or a rubber woman. He has in this case was always the possibility to restart the game saves before.
Degtyarev did not like to go out at night with 'Skadovska.' He was not afraid of monsters. He was afraid of something come. Toilet on 'Skadovsk' was not.
Repair weapons Degtyarev could himself, with anyone, especially because there was a sea of spare parts. But he liked to Cardan and though as that support it, he paid him the money.
Degtyarev did not understand where the shooter got out, because no one wooden door leading to the basement, do not open even with the box of dynamite.

If you have taken off the game for the 10th time in the evening on the desktop, do not miss a hammer and knock on the computer. Especially do not need to turn on the TV and watch the show titled 'Our shame in Vancouver.' Just relax, drink vodka and wait for the next fixation.
If your old computer has become suspiciously quiet work, is thoughtful, open the lid and remove the dead mouse from the fan.

If from your speakers too loud at night were heard shooting and explosions, and the neighbors called the precinct - do not worry. Just put him on his place and give him finally to deal with a group of bandits.
Becoming the 'Diplomat' Degtyarev decided to reconcile factions and remembering how once walked into an art gallery sat down to write a letter to the Turkish sultan.

Ask friends Mityaya include ransom bandits - 'Goldfish'. Degtyarev long tried to revive rybku.Rybka sign of life has not filed. -Then Let take - decided Degtyarev, who at the beginning of 'crushed toad.'
Degtyarev met Snork. Mask at Snork was better than Degtyaryova and he felt sorry for the native of the SBU.
John Smith awoke in the night in a cold sweat. He dreamed that the corpse Barges Nicholas stuck in the pipe on the Pripyat, and the skeleton of the Joker is under his bed.

If you can not recruit a large number Headshots - not rassraivaytes. This does not mean that you are shooting poorly. Just buy the 'mouse' with a good 'hit up'. If this does not help, then drop to play Stalker, do yourself a slingshot and earn headshots in cats.
If you have a sunny day, going to the Creek in the water began to pull off his exoskeleton and look in your inventory smelting, then you need to just go to sleep and in the morning sober.
Once in the Zone Degtyarev headed straight to Kardanu.Postavil front of him a couple of bottles of vodka and demanded in no matter what was to alter the premium PM in gauss gun.
Sat Degtyarev, Bloodsucker, Flesh and Controller near the tent to play cards. Bloodsucker lost tentacles Flesh - eyes, and Controller not only lost a hand. but also their eggs.
On holidays stalkers fun rather monotonous - drinking, eating, telling jokes and postrelivat ....... not always in the air.
Degtyarev gladly responded to the request to destroy Hypericum smoothly bloodsuckers. Bloodsuckers prevented Degtyaryova catch fish there.
The question of illegal privatization of the tunnel a couple Burer Degtyarev decided by means of iron and soldering iron
Degtyarev decided to roll owl for rudeness in a barrel of cement and throw in a smoothly. But at the cement plant he found anything, except cement.
Only after the last reboot fourth saves Degtyarev got sharper in custom treasured FT-2000. Nimble constantly trying to sell to the hated Degtyaryova 'Storm'
Degtyarev went to collect artifacts and met Little Red Riding Hood with a basket full of 'Basilisk'. Little Red Riding Hood otmazatsya kind.
When Old Tushkan saw Degtyaryova steep shotgun he opened his mouth and fell dentures.
When the 'Svoboda' had a choice, smoke pot or fight with the 'Duty'. opinion was unanimous.

How many times Degtyarev have walked to the tower, from the space bubbles so more and no one dropped out. And he went to look for another in the hope that at least from the following drop out girls live, not dead 'dolgovtsev.'
When the sky fell the first snowflakes Degtyarev decided it was time to throw out of the zone. Winter Bronnikov was not even the scientists and the boots he is not picked up.
Loud music prevented Degtyaryova night's sleep. He went into the hole Talking Controller, got a sleeping bag and a sweet snoring.
The game, played in the Stalker Fanatic, but went to the site as a woman ..... Type the ship.
How not to win the moderators tried to flood the forum, but flooding still ranked first in the fight for the medals.
Degtyaryova bored with everyday life 'Skadovsk' and he opened a brothel and a sex shop. Beard Sychom bankrupt and went begging in the mutants.
Degtyarev looked out the door. Weather or anything good did not promise, failed to shoot someone and he decided to go back to sleep.
Myron CONTROLLER with digging a tunnel toward a bright future. Degtyarev came and told him to dig faster. Time is running out, and Degtyarev wanted to go home to his wife.
In 'Freedom' with 'Duty' was a strong marriage. They let go of each other with respect and sometimes caustic jokes postrelivat each other. So loved!
Degtyarev mutants treated like guys. Belt he was not stupid and had to shoot.
Degtyarev gave Kanevskomu parcel of the Avenger, ran to a safe distance and with the words 'God knows I did not want to!' thrice crossed.
-Atas, Guys !!! He not only frail gun, but always with a grenade launcher !!! - Bandit yelled when he saw approaching the port cranes Degtyaryova.
Noticing sharper great craving for captured weapons, Degtyarev bought at owl shovel and went to dig on the battlefields of World War II.
Mutants accompanied evacuation helicopters Degtyaryova on board with eyes full of tears of happiness.
Degtyarev decided that the gas cylinder can still be useful and loaded CBT-34 salt.
-That Is not you Hilo siganul! - Noah noticed, looking at Degtyaryova, jumps from fifth floor balcony in some underpants.
Noticing sharper great craving for captured weapons, Degtyarev bought at owl shovel and went to dig on the battlefields of World War II.
Fire Chimera zavralsya to such an extent that when he began to tell as robbed 'dolgovtsev' kilograms of cocaine were laughing to tears even 'Svoboda'.
Degtyarev was bored to iznemozheniya.On pinned pack Pseudodogs number on the back, released ahead of a trained jerboa and went to take bets from stalkers.
Degtyarev wife vowed not to change it in the Zone with any woman. Pervo¸ that saw Degtyarev in the area turned flesh. But this is clearly not a woman ... - happy Degtyarev.
In the morning, coming off 'Skadovska' Degtyarev stepped in a pile of flesh shit. Thinking he proposed to introduce 'Skadovsk' not only savers, bodyguard and huckster and post janitor.
To divert attention from November to the door Degtyarev, before opening the door, threw the hole before November cat dog.
Cardan. Old moron. None of know-how into his head does not climb the vodka! - Spat evil Degyar¸v.Vzyal old shabby Armorer, ripped and sewed myself more heels containers for artifacts.

To stalkers do not bother with the Guides Degtyarev walked the zone and gave brand new satellite navigators known Japanese firm. Now they not only could not get lost in broad daylight, but also to find the loot, a place forgotten by pyani.
Having learned that some men in the Zone, where the girls pushed the crowd.
-Opyat Beetle-crusher fucking slipped! ... - Muttered irritably stalker, looking askance Chinese label sewn inside the boot.
Most mercenaries shoot well, but suffered multiple sclerosis - check removed and the grenade throw forgotten.
Degtyarev caught on Midsummer Majorana 'alfovtsa.' Strictly pointed out that the state should follow weapons and released
Yelling, shouting 'alfovtsy' 'Degtyarev, come !!!' ... Well, he went out.
Aliens Manila Chernobyl. Poor build and maintain they did not know how. A reactor exploded at home does not raise his hand.
Degtyaryova bit blind dog and ran away. Tremor advised in any case to make 40 shots in the stomach.
After an unpleasant incident with driftwood Degtyarev put in a cellar on Midsummer armored door and the keys given only Deerslayer.
Degtyarev lit trails safe 'Firefly' -s, but as always they were separated stalkers.
Going again to Noah Degtyarev took away his shotgun from sin and gave the gun to play pinball.
In Degtyaryova from constant wear Armorsmith numb hands and feet. Therefore, the night he wore a T-shirt, shorts, sneakers and ran with 'Skadovska' to Pripyat and back.
Degtyaryova tired now and then to change the binoculars, and he set in his PDA program of direct satellite observation.
Upgrades Degtyarev knife on his head. Turned his sword kladenets!
Degdyar¸v goes and sees - sits psevdogigant and bitter weeping over a photograph of an African elephant, devouring bananas.
To Tushkan no longer spoiled Armorer Degtyarev, he released a pack of monkeys in the Zone. They rode through the trees, loudly and built Tushkanov faces.
Do not have time to gather up money for Degtyarev camouflage overalls 'Desert Storm' as broke winter.
St. John's wort sent Degtyaryova deal with Burer in the tunnel. Degtyarev killed one, and the second took alive.
Instead of 'Goldfish' Shishak received from Degtyaryova golden smile.
The bandits wanted to see naked girls with binoculars and saw a middle finger Degtyaryova.
From the toilet on Degtyaryova watching eye of the flesh. Degtyarev shy and moved to a nearby toilet.
On April Degtyarev dumped in the middle of 'Skadovska' a bunch of toy weapons. Oddly enough, stalkers pilfered everything.
At Easter all mutants hiding. Degtyarev walked with a knife and looking for eggs.
I saw under the car Degtyarev personal rucksack and just in case called 911.
Degtyarev sketched in the clearing of nails. Psevdogigant stamped his foot and was blown away.

I thought and thought Degtyarev how to simplify dealing with the collection of loot from the corpses and trained to Pseudodogs. Then he got the idea nadressirovat it right to carry stuff in the recovery and bring out money.

Came into the bunker scientists Professor Sakharov hoping to find out from Degtyaryova as that managed to develop a unique psy-protection on the tattered Tolik in Tushkanov 'Dawn', but configs Degtyarev kept secret.
Morning Degtyarev met a joyful smile. The mod added a toothbrush, toothpaste, soap, towel, comb, mirror and even imported cleaner Armorsmith.
Alfovtsy, armed to the teeth, with a brutal expression on their faces, walked proudly in the Zone and naively thought that looking Degtyaryova.
Two weeks later, Degtyarev still decided to tell Loki the corpse Slivers of his career. The corpse began to decompose and stop collecting artifacts.
'Svobodovtsy' Rolling Stone narasskazyvali such sweet tales about 'Freedom', some do not even know-CONSCIOUSNESS!
Liked Degtyaryova on a farm in Burnt anomaly jump. Jumped in, and fell a second time with 'dolgovtsev' in the tower.
Couple bloodsuckers were very lyuboptnymi. They decided not smell gas, and see what to do with them Degtyarev.
Degtyarev greatly puzzled Gromoboya, laid out in front of him ten names Vintar and inviting find among them his own.
Shooter for pulling in a rucksack notes group gave Degtyaryova pair artifacts. The place where the arrow stuck Degtyarev artifacts in the game is missing from the moral and ethical considerations.
Degtyarev came to Pripyat with the 'crust' of the SBU and the military understand everything without words - tryndets Kowalski.
In 'Svoboda' unexpectedly terminated 'grass' and they started smoking discarded Pellicle.of a viper.

Third day stalkers with amazement watching Degtyaryova shootout with Monster near the cinema 'Prometheus' and waited for the denouement. Poor. They did not know that Monster drunk 'living water', while Degtyaryova belt dangling five zachiter¸nnyh outrageously artifacts 'Monolith'.

All demanded Degtyaryova extreme. Then he waited Alpha, put on the ground five gas cylinders, put the barrel of fuel and started shooting 'with the stop.' Alfovtsy decided not to tempt fate and more of them in the Zone has not been seen.
-No, Well, that's what the hell do you go on the Zone as bomzhara! - Said Degtyarev Controller and pulled on his T-shirt with the logo of SGM.
In the Zone was planned output. But stalkers do not pay attention to the messages on the radio. They have long since learned to 'Svoboda' swallow pills 'antidote' on schedule and without.
-Aaaa ... So you decided to stay ... - sarcastically laughed Uncle Yar, even on the eve of Clean all zagashnike Degtyaryova.
-So Are you an expert on 'burrows' - smiling broadly and fiddling with the next issue of the magazine 'Playboy' Topol said, seeing Degtyaryova.
